card_1.cardText:
> “_Talk to the person sitting alone. Hug a crying child. Say hello to a stranger. Call a friend having a hard time. Take a moment to do something for someone else. Love each other better. Kindness can cause a ripple effect. And small gestures can create very big change. Iam living proof.”_

Ashley Hoff

card_10.cardText:
Hoff and her husband sat in the fourth row at the Route 91 Harvest Music Festival in Las Vegas on October 1, 2017 when 58 people were murdered. Neither were shot, but both were forever changed. Hoff wrote about their ordeal for Refinery 29.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-10-02-qtd/)
